scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n "infra,api,baml,vector,frontend" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "bun run dev:infra" "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:baml" "bun run dev:vector" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:infra: cd infra && docker-compose up -d && echo 'Databases started'
scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/shared-types && bun run build && cd ../baml && bun run build && cd ../vector && bun run build
scripts.build:apps: cd apps/api && bun run build && cd ../frontend && bun run build
scripts.setup:workspaces: cd apps/frontend && bun install && cd ../api && bun install && cd ../gateway && bun install && cd ../../packages/baml && bun install && cd ../vector && bun install
